title: MLB most exciting player bracket: Featuring the most electrifying star on all 30 teams
content: Witt or Judge? Ohtani or De La Cruz? We narrow the field -- with a rep from every team -- to one true must-watch player.

title: McCarthy rallies Vikings in 4th quarter of debut
content: In thrilling fashion Monday night, Minnesota quarterback J.J. McCarthy authored a late comeback, becoming the first quarterback in NFL history to account for three touchdowns in the fourth quarter of his NFL debut, as the Vikings outlasted the Bears.

title: Dolphins star Hill accused of domestic violence
content: Tyreek Hill's estranged wife has alleged in court filings that he committed domestic violence, which the Dolphins receiver has vehemently denied.

title: Sources: Colorado expected to start Staub at QB
content: The Colorado Buffaloes are expected to start Ryan Staub at quarterback for Friday's game at Houston, sources told ESPN.

title: 49ers' Kittle out weeks; Purdy could miss Week 2
content: The 49ers will be without star tight end George Kittle for multiple weeks due to a hamstring injury, while Brock Purdy might need to sit out Week 2 after hurting a shoulder and toe in the team's Week 1 win in Seattle.

title: Big 12 penalizes officiating crew over rules gaffe
content: The Big 12 has removed an officiating crew from a Week 3 assignment after the group committed a rules violation during Missouri's win over Kansas, the conference announced on Tuesday.

title: Sources: Jags trade Bigsby to Eagles for picks
content: The Jaguars are trading running back Tank Bigsby to the Eagles for 2026 fifth- and sixth-round picks, sources told ESPN.

title: Sister of Wolves' Reid allegedly slain by boyfriend
content: The sister of Timberwolves player Naz Reid was fatally shot at a New Jersey apartment complex, and her boyfriend has been charged with murder.

title: Dodgers just miss no-hitter again; Glasnow stars
content: Tyler Glasnow, who struck out 11 and walked two on 105 pitches in his first career start against Colorado, combined with the Los Angeles Dodgers bullpen to one-hit the Rockies in a 3-1 win Monday night, as the veteran starter improved to 2-3 this season.

title: ‚úç NFL trade grades: Who won Bigsby deal?
content: The Eagles added some running back depth behind Saquon Barkley, but did they give up too much for Bigsby? We sized up the deal from both sides.

title: Let's rank the best QB debuts of Week 1: Promising signs for Fields, Rodgers and Jones?
content: Can Justin Fields and Aaron Rodgers sustain their great Week 1 play? Ben Solak stacks the top QB newcomers -- and begs the Giants to hold off on Jaxson Dart.

title: Biggest early-season enigmas in our latest Bubble Watch
content: Putting the spotlight on select teams and question marks around others as the early playoff picture takes shape.

title: Travis Hunter effect is alive in the 2025 college football season
content: There won't be another player like Hunter. But his play has inspired other teams to look for two-way stars.

title: The John Cena eras: From Ruthless Aggression to 17-time WWE champ
content: We highlight the key moments from Cena's remarkable 23-year career before he retires the jorts in December.

title: Week 1 fantasy football winners and losers and injury impacts from Sunday
content: A summary of Week 1's best and worst fantasy performances, biggest storylines and historical perspective.

title: Barnwell separates fact from fiction off NFL Week 1
content: Let's size up the legitimacy of the Lions' offensive woes, Aaron Rodgers' big day and the Dolphins' ineptitude.

title: Excerpt: The forgotten legend of Notre Dame coach Frank Leahy
content: He won the most national titles of any Notre Dame football coach, but Frank Leahy's achievements in South Bend have been underappreciated.

title: Top 50 USMNT players, ranked by club form: Which players has Pochettino missed?
content: Who are the 50 best USMNT players right now? Based on club performances and data analytics, we have the answer. Should Mauricio Pochettino listen?

title: WNBA Power Rankings: A new No. 1 -- and highlights for every team in final edition
content: The hottest team and the top team aren't the always same. See our final 1-13 as the regular season wraps.

title: Ranking first-year WNBA coaches who have beaten -- or fallen short of -- expectations
content: Natalie Nakase has the Valkyries playoff-bound. Here's how all seven first-time WNBA head coaches have done.

title: New faces, new places: Ranking the top 14 newcomers for the 2025-26 NBA season
content: Coach Mike Brown, Kevin Durant, Myles Turner and others are ranked by who will be the most impactful on their new teams.

title: Explaining USWNT star Alyssa Thompson's move from Angel City to Chelsea
content: Alyssa Thompson's high-priced move has implications for the USWNT, NWSL, Chelsea, Angel City and the player herself. Let's break it all down.

title: Can anyone stop Lamine Yamal and Spain marching to World Cup glory?
content: Spain's 6-0 win in Turkey was an exquisite recital of sublime football that has Lamine Yamal, Pedri & Co. looking like World Cup winners in waiting. Can they be stopped?

title: With nine months until World Cup, does Pochettino know his best USMNT XI?
content: If Pochettino doesn't know his USMNT XI, is he willing to commit to one soon before he runs out of time ahead of the World Cup?

title: NFL Week 1's top performance? Check the fan-voted 'Himmy' Award leaderboard
content: Fans weighed in on Week 1's top players, casting their votes for the 'Himmy' Award between Josh Allen, Aaron Rodgers, Emeka Egbuka and Daniel Jones.

title: Canelo vs. Crawford: History of boxers moving up in weight
content: Terence Crawford is not the first fighter to move up multiple divisions for better challenges. How did the other boxers do?

title: All you need to know about Saturday's fight
content: Andreas Hale explains why Canelo Alvarez and Terence Crawford are fighting, what it means for boxing and more.

title: Real or not? 14 contenders, 14 reasons they can -- or can't? -- win the World Series
content: Lack of power? Bullpen holes? Injured stars? Why each contender's biggest weakness will -- or won't -- sink them in October.

title: Three young arms are here to carry the Mets into October
content: The rookie trio of Nolan McLean, Jonah Tong and Brandon Sproat looks to lift New York's fortunes this season.

title: Should you bet on Mateer or Moore to win the Heisman?
content: As the odds shift each week for the coveted Heisman Trophy and national championship, Pamela Maldonado explains how to bet each of them.

title: 'Trump gave green light': Blasts in Doha; Israel confirms strike on Hamas leaders
content: Explosions rocked Doha, Qatar, on Tuesday, with smoke reported over the Katara district, according to Israeli media citing government officials. Israeli forces claimed responsibility, stating they targeted senior Hamas officials involved in orchestrating attacks against Israel, including the October 7 events. Al Jazeera reported the Hamas negotiation delegation was targeted during a meeting.

title: Shocking! Ind vs Pak Asia Cup tickets still not sold out
content: Dubai is gearing up for the Asia Cup 2025, but surprisingly, tickets for the highly anticipated India vs. Pakistan match on September 14 are still available, despite exorbitant prices reaching over Rs 2.5 lakh for two seats. The captains' press conference saw India's Suryakumar Yadav and Pakistan's Salman Ali Agha kept apart, setting the stage for the intense rivalry.

title: Google tightens AI use: Coders face strict rules; external tools prohibited
content: Google is mandating its software engineers to exclusively use internal AI models for coding, driven by CEO Sundar Pichai's call for AI adoption to maintain competitiveness. Employees are expected to demonstrate AI proficiency, potentially influencing performance reviews and career advancement.

title: ITR filing FY25: What is the deadline & will it be extended? Know penalty for late filing
content: ITR filing FY 2024-25: The Income Tax Department has extended the ITR filing deadline for AY 2025-26 to September 15, 2025, for non-audit taxpayers. This extension, from the usual July 31st, accommodates changes in ITR forms. Taxpayers are advised to file before the deadline to avoid penalties, including late fees up to Rs 5,000 and a 1% monthly interest on outstanding taxes.

title: iPhone 17 launch event today: How, when and where to watch; expected devices
content: Apple's "Awe Dropping" event on September 9, 2025, is set to unveil the iPhone 17 series, including the rumored iPhone 17 Air, replacing the Plus model. Anticipate upgrades to the Apple Watch, potentially introducing the Ultra 3 with enhanced features, and a redesigned AirPods Pro 3 with a new H3 chip.

title: Avalanche strikes Siachen base camp in Ladakh; 3 soldiers killed
content: Tragedy struck the Siachen sector in Ladakh as an avalanche claimed the lives of three Indian Army personnel at a base camp. Siachen, notorious for its extreme weather and high altitude of over 18,000 feet, presents formidable challenges for military deployments.

title: Asia Cup opening ceremony: Is it happening?
content: Asia Cup is back, with India starting its title defence against UAE. An opening ceremony is unlikely. India face Pakistan on Sunday. Shubman Gill returns, creating competition. Jasprit Bumrah leads the bowling attack. The tournament serves as preparation for the upcoming Twenty20 World Cup. All eyes are on the marquee clash between India and Pakistan.

title: Jake Elliott vs Phillies Karen: Viral rumor sparks fake family drama; Eagles kicker reacts
content: A false rumor spread online claiming Philadelphia Eagles kicker Jake Elliott is the uncle of Lincoln Feltwell, the boy involved in the "Phillies Karen" incident. This claim, which surfaced after a Phillies game in August 2024, included a fabricated quote attributed to Elliott. However, no evidence supports any connection between Elliott and the Feltwell family.

title: US halts EB-1 till Oct 2025; EB-2 stays frozen: What Indian applicants must know
content: The US has halted EB-1 green card issuances until October 1, 2025, after reaching the annual cap for fiscal year 2025. This follows a similar freeze in the EB-2 category. Indian applicants face continued delays, with the EB-1 final action date stuck at February 15, 2022. No EB-1 or EB-2 approvals will be made until the new fiscal year begins. Adjustment of status applications may still be filed if priority dates remain current.

title: Asia Cup: Backstage video of PCB chair Naqvi with Suryakumar surfaces - Watch
content: A video of Pakistan Cricket Board chairman Mohsin Naqvi warmly greeting India's T20I captain Suryakumar Yadav ahead of the Asia Cup 2025 has gone viral, adding buzz to the India-Pakistan rivalry. Despite political tensions and Naqvi's recent remarks about India, cricket took center stage as captains discussed their ambitions for the tournament, which begins today with Afghanistan facing Hong Kong.

title: Humans' maximum lifespan: Scientists say, impossible beyond 150 years
content: Research indicates a potential human lifespan limit between 120 and 150 years, regardless of lifestyle. A study in Nature Communications reveals that the body's resilience declines with age, impacting recovery from illnesses. Analyzing blood cell counts and physical activity, scientists found a point where the body can no longer fully recover, suggesting a biological ceiling on longevity.

title: Watch: PM Modi conducts aerial survey in flood-hit Himachal; to visit Punjab next
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi surveyed flood-ravaged areas in Himachal Pradesh, including Mandi and Kullu, following heavy monsoon rains. He then proceeded to Punjab for a similar assessment. Review meetings were held with officials and affected residents in both states, addressing the devastation and coordinating relief efforts. The floods have caused significant fatalities and displacement in both regions.

title: JJ McCarthy: $2 mn net worth; Vikings deal & salary; endorsements 2025
content: J.J. McCarthy, the Minnesota Vikings' quarterback, boasts a $2 million net worth in 2025, primarily from his NFL contract and endorsements. After a setback due to injury in 2024, McCarthy is now starting for the Vikings, showcasing his talent and leadership. His financial success is expected to grow with future contracts and brand deals as his career progresses.

title: US firm signs $500 mn deal with Pakistan; eyes gold, antimony, rare earth and more
content: US Strategic Metals has signed a $500 million investment deal with Pakistan to develop its mineral sector, focusing on critical minerals. This agreement, along with another with Mota-Engil Group, aims to boost mineral processing and large-scale mining projects in Pakistan. The US embassy hailed the deal as a sign of strengthened US-Pakistan relations.

title: All-time Indian greats: Ex-cricketer stirs debate; says 'Rohit does not quite make it'
content: Former India cricketer Sanjay Manjrekar ignited a debate by stating that Rohit Sharma, despite his ODI achievements and leadership, doesn't quite reach the level of Indian batting legends like Gavaskar, Tendulkar, Dravid, and Kohli. Manjrekar emphasised Test cricket's significance in defining greatness, suggesting Rohit's impact in that format was not substantial enough.

title: Nepal GenZ protests: Ministers resign; India border on high alert - top 10 developments
content: Nepal faces a political crisis as youth-led protests against a social media ban and corruption turned violent, resulting in 19 deaths and numerous injuries. Prime Minister KP Sharma Oli resigned amidst mounting public anger, prompting a search for a new leader. Arson attacks targeted leaders' residences, and security tightened along the India-Nepal border.

title: Watch: Protesters torch Nepal PM Oli‚Äôs private home; storm, vandalise president's residence
content: Protests in Nepal escalated, resulting in vandalism at the residences of President Poudel and KP Sharma Oli, alongside the torching of the Nepali Congress party office. Demonstrators are demanding accountability for fatalities during protests against the government's social media ban, which has now been reversed.

title: Victor Wembanyama‚Äôs fan moment: Meets Harry Potter star; Radcliffe shines in NBA offseason
content: Victor Wembanyama's offseason adventures have captivated the internet, highlighted by an Instagram post showcasing his diverse experiences. The Spurs' star fulfilled a dream by meeting Daniel Radcliffe, sharing a photo from their encounter. Wembanyama's summer also included a NASA visit, thrombosis treatment, and time spent with Snoop Dogg, demonstrating his wide-ranging interests beyond basketball.

title: Nepal unrest rages: IndiGo suspends Kathmandu service; several flights diverted to Lucknow
content: IndiGo has suspended all flights to and from Kathmandu due to the airport's closure amidst the current situation in the Nepalese capital. Several flights bound for Kathmandu, including those from Dubai, Mumbai, Delhi, and Bangkok, were diverted to Lucknow.

title: Pushing back against Trump: Refiners eye more Russia crude; face cargo issues
content: Despite US opposition, Indian state-owned oil refiners intend to resume full-scale purchases of discounted Russian crude, but face delays due to limited cargo availability and Moscow's focus on Chinese markets.

title: Sunjay Kapur's asset row: Karisma Kapoor's kids move Delhi HC; alleges Priya Sachdev of forgery
content: Following Sunjay Kapur's death, a dispute over his Rs 30,000 crore estate has emerged. Karisma Kapoor's children, Samaira and Kiaan, have approached the Delhi High Court, alleging that their stepmother, Priya Sachdev, forged Sunjay's will. They claim the will is fabricated and seeks action for their exclusion, while Sunjay's mother was allegedly forced to sign papers during her mourning period.

title: World archery c'ship: Indian women make bronze medal match; men fall short
content: The Indian women's recurve archery team, led by Deepika Kumari, will compete for bronze at the World Archery Championships after reaching the semifinals. The men's team faced an early exit, while compound archers couldn't add to India's medal tally. India has already secured a historic men's team gold and a mixed team silver in the compound section.

title: JJ McCarthy‚Äôs girlfriend Katya Kuropas: Vikings QB‚Äôs longtime love, now fianc√©e - who is she?
content: Minnesota Vikings' rookie J.J. McCarthy is set for his NFL debut against the Chicago Bears, marking a pivotal moment for the franchise and the player. Off the field, McCarthy's personal life is flourishing. He is engaged to his high school sweetheart, Katya Kuropas, and they are expecting their first child in September.

title: Delhi CM Secretariat, Maulana Azad Medical College get bomb threat
content: A bomb threat email targeted Delhi's Chief Minister's Secretariat and Maulana Azad Medical College, prompting immediate responses. Fire tenders and bomb disposal squads were dispatched to both locations for thorough anti-sabotage checks. Authorities are investigating the email's origin, suspecting it may have been misdirected, but are treating the threat with utmost seriousness, ensuring public safety and security.

title: Sparks already flying! Why India and Pak skippers weren't seated together at Asia Cup presser
content: In Dubai, organisers strategically placed Afghanistan's Rashid Khan between India's Suryakumar Yadav and Pakistan's Salman Ali Agha at the Asia Cup 2025 press conference. Yadav emphasized the importance of aggression for victory, while Agha left emotional regulation to his players. India, aiming for their ninth title, will face Pakistan on September 14.

title: GST overhaul: Govt permits revised MRPs on unsold stock; old packaging allowed till Dec
content: The government has granted packaged goods manufacturers permission to print revised MRPs on unsold stock following the new GST rules, allowing them to use existing packaging until December. This decision addresses industry concerns about potential waste of packaging material worth over Rs 2,000 crore.

title: NFL Week 2 preview: Top storylines ahead; key matchups, kickoff dates, how to watch
content: Week 2 of the 2025 NFL season features a Super Bowl LIX rematch between the Eagles and Chiefs, with Kansas City seeking redemption after a Week 1 loss. Aaron Rodgers aims to continue his strong start with the Steelers against the Seahawks. Ben Johnson returns to Detroit as the Bears' head coach for a key NFC North showdown.

title: Allu Arjun‚Äôs Business Park flagged for illegal construction; GHMC issues notice
content: Icon Star Allu Arjun's family faces legal trouble as the Greater Hyderabad Municipal Corporation (GHMC) issued a notice regarding illegal construction at Allu Business Park in Jubilee Hills. The GHMC alleges unauthorized extensions on the fourth floor, violating the sanctioned plan. Deputy Commissioner Sammaiah has ordered an inquiry into the matter.

title: Asia Cup: Surya warns Pakistan; drops hints of aggression on September 14
content: Suryakumar Yadav, India's captain, has issued a confident warning to Pakistan ahead of their Asia Cup clash, emphasizing the team's inherent aggression on the field. He acknowledged the long gap since India's last T20I but expressed confidence in the team's preparation and adaptability.

title: Nepal protest: Manisha Koirala breaks her silence; calls it a ‚ÄòBlack Day'
content: Bollywood actress Manisha Koirala has expressed her heartbreak over the violent protests erupting in Nepal after the government banned several social media platforms. Koirala, a native of Kathmandu, called it a 'black day' as security forces responded with gunfire to demonstrations against the ban on platforms like Facebook and YouTube.

title: Blow for Indian IT? Trump admin‚Äôs HIRE Act sends jitters; tax on overseas jobs likely
content: A proposed US bill, the HIRE Act, threatens Indian IT firms with a 25% tax on outsourced services, potentially eroding their competitive edge. This legislative move, coupled with existing market pressures, could force Indian companies to seek growth beyond the US and impact new contract acquisitions. The bill raises concerns about increased costs and reduced demand for IT services.

title: Elon Musk blends science and philosophy with a question on reality
content: Tech mogul Elon Musk's recent philosophical post on the nature of reality has sparked widespread interest. His ventures like SpaceX and Neuralink, pushing the boundaries of human existence, frame his inquiry. Musk's reflection came amidst progress in Mars landing simulations and his growing political influence.

title: Asia Cup: India the favourites? Pakistan captain Salman Agha says 'not really'
content: Pakistan captain Salman Agha has given his fast bowlers the green light to be aggressive during the Asia Cup, emphasizing that aggression is inherent to their game. He stressed the importance of playing good cricket and aiming to win the tournament. Agha acknowledged India's strong Asia Cup record but believes any team can win in T20 cricket.

title: Kia India passes full GST benefit: Model-wise savings up to Rs 4.48 lakh
content: Kia India will extend the full benefit of the recent GST reduction to customers on its ICE portfolio, effective September 22, 2025. The price cuts vary by model, with the Sonet seeing a reduction of up to Rs 1.64 lakh and the Carnival getting the biggest slash of Rs 4.48 lakh.

title: Maratha quota row: Jarange warns of blocking Mumbai milk supply; Dasara plans announced
content: Manoj Jarange, a quota activist, returned to his village after a hunger strike, warning the government to meet Maratha reservation demands by September 17. He threatened to halt milk and vegetable supplies to Mumbai if the government fails to distribute Kunbi caste certificates to Marathas in Marathwada based on the Hyderabad Gazette.

title: Dhanashree Verma gives out a strong message for women post divorce with Yuzvendra Chahal
content: Dhanashree Verma and Yuzvendra Chahal finalized their divorce earlier this year, aiming for a swift resolution before the IPL season. Dhanashree, now part of 'Rise And Fall,' shared her message of resilience for women post-divorce, emphasizing the importance of continuing to work hard and inspiring others to move forward with strength.

title: Bow wow! Stray dogs corner bike thieves, cops swoop in; 40 stolen motorcycles recovered
content: A gang of vehicle thieves, responsible for stealing over 40 motorcycles in Lucknow, were apprehended thanks to an unexpected intervention. During a police chase near Kudiya Ghat, a pack of stray dogs blocked the criminals' escape route, forcing them into a dead end where police were waiting.

title: Armed Forces contingent leaves for Russia to join multilateral military exercise
content: According to the Defence Ministry, ZAPAD 2025, scheduled from September 10 to 16, is aimed at boosting military cooperation, improving interoperability and providing a platform for participating nations to exchange tactics, techniques and procedures in conventional warfare and counter-terrorism operations

title: Recruits will mandatorily serve in designated posts for 10 years, says Energy Minister
content: K.J. George says new policy will address the problem of shortage of staff due to transfers taken using political influence

title: NDA candidate C.P. Radhakrishnan elected 15th Vice-President of India
content: A total of 767 MPs cast their ballot in a turnout of 98.2%, of which 752 were valid and 15 votes were deemed invalid, Mr. Mody said; one postal ballot was cancelled as the MP declined to cast the vote

title: BJD‚Äôs abstention from V-P election appears to be a tacit bid to block Congress‚Äôs revival in Odisha
content: The BJD and the BJP have exhibited an aggressive posturing as sworn rivals over the past decade and a half; yet at critical moments, they have come to each other‚Äôs rescue, says a political analyst

title: Owaisi criticises India‚Äôs bilateral investment treaty with Israel
content: SIO also condemned the presence of Israel‚Äôs far-right Finance Minister Bezalel Smotrich, calls Israel ‚Äòoppressor‚Äô

title: Domestic help arrested for murder of elderly woman in Kurnool district
content: Police recover property stolen by the accused from the deceased‚Äôs house and the weapon used to commit the offence; accused planned to kill and rob valuables of the 75-year-old to make easy money, according to SP

title: Bevco‚Äôs plastic bottle buy-back scheme poised to cover entire Kerala incrementally¬†
content: The Bevco will charge a small monetary deposit of ‚Çπ20 for the bottle. When consumers return the empty bottle to the retail shop, it will refund the deposit or reduce it from the cost of their next purchase.

title: Action will be taken against corrupt officials, says Minister
content: The Integrated Child Development Scheme that introduced the anganwadi system will complete 50 years this year, according to Hebbalkar

title: Officials told to remove road encroachments on war footing in Guntur
content: GMC Commissioner directs officials to ensure encroachments on major roads, margins, and drains do not recur; reviews complaints on poor sanitation and orders immediate measures

title: Karnataka pitches for U.K.‚Äôs MRCP PG qualifier exams to be held in State
content: Karnataka is all set to sign eight MoUs with various U.K. universities to collaborate on healthcare research

title: Upgraded 20-car Vande Bharat begins service  Thiruvananthapuram-Mangaluru route
content: With this, both Vande Bharat Expresses operating fully within Kerala now run with the maximum 20-car configuration

title: Tamil Nadu government launches Marine Resources Foundation to protect and restore marine biodiversity
content: The government also launches a special purpose vehicle to restore the environmentally sensitive Manali-Ennore region. It will focus on green projects, waterbody restoration, solid waste management, pollution control, and community infrastructure development

title: Kunnamkulam custodial assault case: Youth Congress leader moves court to arraign police driver as fifth accused
content: V.S. Sujith alleges driver Suhair brutally attacked him; fresh petitions push for stronger charges against suspended officers

title: A teacher who makes learning a joy
content: Lower primary teacher Kishorkumar M.S. introduces fresh and impactful ideas to the classroom each year. ‚ÄòGrowing classroom‚Äô is one such initiative

title: A.P. records double-digit growth in first quarter of 2025-26, surpasses national average
content: Industrial sector leads with 11.91% growth driven by 43.54% rise in mining and quarrying; services sector grows by 10.70% riding on gains in tourism, hotels, and transport; happy with growth figures, Chandrababu Naidu tells officials to work towards 17.1% target set for next year

title: Nepal Foreign Minister Kicked, Punched In Face Amid Violent Protests
content: After demonstrations by 'Gen Z' protesters against corruption, nepotism and social media ban in Nepal took a violent turn, videos show the country's Foreign Minister Arzu Rana Deuba being kicked and punched after a hostile mob broke into their home.

title: Need To Shut Population Control Programmes: PM's Economic Advisor
content: India does not have an aging population yet but it is time to consider the future and shut down the birth control programmes, Sanjeev Sanyal, member of Prime Minister Narendra Modi's Economic Advisory Council, told NDTV today.

title: 'Cops Taking Casual Approach': Baba Siddique's Son On Father's Murder Probe
content: NCP leader Zeeshan Siddique on Tuesday alleged that the Mumbai police have taken a "casual" approach in the investigation into the murder of his father, Baba Siddique.

title: PM Modi To Inaugurate Textile Park In Madhya Pradesh On 75th Birthday
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will lay the foundation stone for the country's first textile park being developed under the PM MITRA scheme on September 17, his 75th birthday, in Madhya Pradesh

title: Ex Nepal PM's Wife Burnt Alive As Protesters Set His House On Fire
content: Rajyalaxmi Chitrakar, the wife of Nepal's ex-prime minister Jhalanath Khanal, died on Tuesday, say media reports, after protesters, led by Gen Z, trapped her in their home and set the house on fire.

title: Ex Nepal PM Bleeds, Sits Helplessly On Field After Army Rescues Him, Wife
content: Amid violent anti-corruption protests in Nepal that continued for the second day, the country's ex-Prime Minister Sher Bahadur Deuba and his wife, Arzu Rana Deuba, the foreign minister, were assaulted by protesters.

title: PM Modi Announces Rs 1,500-Crore Aid For Disaster-Hit Himachal
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Tuesday announced an immediate relief of Rs 1,500 crore for rain-affected Himachal Pradesh.

title: 3 Soldiers Killed In Avalanche In Siachen, World's Highest Battlefield
content: Three soldiers lost their lives when an avalanche struck Siachen, the world's highest battlefield, in the Union Territory of Ladakh, officials said on Tuesday.

title: 12 MPs Who Have Abstained From Voting In Vice Presidential Election
content: Voting has ended for the vice presidential election, with the lawmakers choosing between the BJP-led ruling alliance's pick of Maharashtra Governor CP Radhakrishnan and the INDIA bloc's ex-Supreme Court judge, Justice B Sudershan Reddy.

title: Voting Ends For Vice President Polls, Results Expected Shortly: 10 Points
content: India will welcome a new Vice President by nightfall September 9. But will it be the BJP-led ruling alliance's pick of Maharashtra Governor CP Radhakrishnan? Or will the INDIA bloc's ex-Supreme Court judge, Justice B Sudershan Reddy, deliver a shock?

title: Opinion: Opinion | Cheap Oil, Heavy Costs: How India's China-Russia Embrace Could Backfire
content: For a country squeezed by US tariffs, Western protectionism, and secondary sanctions, the immediate temptation to hedge through the RIC axis is undeniable. But the gains from this may well lead to strategic entrapment.

title: Opinion: Opinion | A 'Star Wars' Dome To Defend India? Why That's Dazzling, But Not Practical
content: The idea that every Indian citizen, every critical facility, could be wrapped in a dome of protection is attractive. But, as the old aphorism goes, if you seek to defend everything, you may end up defending nothing.

title: In Pics: PM Modi Visits Flood-Hit Punjab, Himachal, Conducts Aerial Survey
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Tuesday visited Punjab and Himachal Pradesh to review the situation in the wake of recent floods and landslides in several parts of north India.

title: Stepmother "Forged" Father Sunjay Kapur's Will: Karisma Kapoor's Children
content: Bollywood actor Karisma Kapoor's children have approached the Delhi High Court seeking a share in their father Sunjay Kapur's property.

title: NDTV Profit GST Conclave Live Updates: Nirmala Sitharaman Says Reforms "1.5 Years In The Making"
content: The conclave will focus on discussions around GST 2.0 - the reform powering a Viksit Bharat with speakers including Union Minister of Commerce and Industry Piyush Goyal, and Chief Economic Advisor V Anantha Nageswaran.

title: Cop Killed, Another Injured As Car Hits Them On Mumbai's Coastal Road
content: A 52-year-old head constable died and a policewoman was injured after a speeding car hit them on the Coastal Road in Mumbai on Tuesday, officials said.

title: Vice President Election Live Updates: Voting Ends For Vice President Election
content: Vice Presidential Election 2025 Live Updates: Parliamentarians will choose between NDA's CP Radhakrishnan and the Opposition's B Sudershan Reddy for the post of Vice President today.

title: At NDTV GST Conclave, BJP And Opposition Differ On Compensation, Responsibility
content: The finance minister of Punjab and Jharkhand and the industries minister of Delhi ensured a spirited start to the NDTV GST Conclave on Tuesday, with their panel discussion on 'Matters of States' witnessing a heated debate on the GST reforms.

title: Nepal Protest Live Updates: Nepal President Ram Chandra Poudel Resigns As Kathmandu Remains On The Boil
content: Nepal Gen-Z Protest LIVE Updates: Nepal Prime Minister K P Sharma Oli resigned on Tuesday, as hundreds of people stormed his office and private residence in Kathmandu during a massive agitation against corruption,

title: 2008 Malegaon Blast: Victims Approach Bombay High Court Against Acquittal Of Pragya Thakur, 6 Others
content: Six family members of people who died in the 2008 Malegaon bomb blast have moved the Bombay High Court, challenging a special court judgment acquitting the seven accused in the case, including former BJP MP Pragya Singh Thakur

title: Transfer rumors, news: PSG prepare new deal for Barcola as Liverpool, Bayern circle
content: Bradley Barcola is wanted by Liverpool and Bayern Munich, and Paris Saint-Germain plan to offer the winger a new deal. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Fantasy hockey defense tiers: The elite, the roster fillers and everyone in between
content: Make your fantasy hockey draft strategy easier with detailed defensemen tiers and a guide to the position.

title: Forward tier list: From must-haves to lottery tickets
content: Make your fantasy hockey draft strategy easier with detailed forward tiers and a guide to the position.

title: Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister unveils invitation for Dasara celebrations at Kanaka Durga temple in Vijayawada
content: Officials invite Naidu to participate in Moola Nakshatram rituals; Endowments Commissioner reviews temple projects, says Sharannavaratri Utsavams draw over 10 lakh devotees

title: T.N. government to felicitate Ilaiyaraaja at event in Chennai on September 13
content: Besides the Chief Minister and the Deputy CM, actors Rajinikanth and Kama Haasan are expected to participate in the function to be held in the Jawarhalal Nehru Indoor Stadium

title: Watch: Meet the temple artisans of Thiruvathigai
content: Thiruvathigai in Cuddalore district, Tamil Nadu, is also renowned for its community of skilled artisans, who specialise in crafting temple vahanas, or processional mounts, and temple cars. We meet the skilled artisans who continue this remarkable tradition, taking orders from temples across the State

title: Karnataka not against internationalisation of education, says Dr. Sudhakar¬†
content: Several universities in the U.K. are keen to set up campuses in Bengaluru, following the Karnataka delegation‚Äôs talks with the heads of various U.K. universities

title: 3,985 quintals of rice seized in joint raid in Gurmitkal
content: The seized rice meant for government schemes was stored illegally in two mills for polishing and sales under different brand names

title: CPI(M) urges Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister to rescue tribal coffee farmers hit by borer pest in Paderu
content: The party State secretary demands higher compensation, State-funded pest control, Coffee Research Centre at Paderu, and stronger marketing and insurance cover for tribal growers

title: Row over removal of gold-plated sheets from Dwarapalaka idols at Sabarimala
content: Special Commissioner has informed Kerala High Court that the gold-plated sheets on the Dwarapalaka idols at the temple entrance have been detached without the court‚Äôs approval

title: Punjab floods: PM Modi conducts aerial survey, meets affected people in Gurdaspur
content: In Gurdaspur, PM Modi met flood-affected people as well as NDRF and SDRF teams; he chaired an official meeting in Gurdaspur to review the situation

title: Here are the big stories from Karnataka today
content: Welcome to the Karnataka Today newsletter, your guide from The Hindu on the major news stories to follow today. Curated and written by Nalme Nachiyar.

title: Catering company ‚ÄòMadhampatty Pakashala‚Äô moves Madras High Court against defamatory posts by costumer designer Joy Crizildaa
content: Justice N. Senthilkumar orders notice, returnable by September 26, to her and permits the counsel for the catering company to serve private notice too

title: Karnataka forest department staff locked up inside tiger trap cage by irate villagers in Bandipur buffer zone
content: In the wake of delayed rsponse from forest staff to repeated complaints about tiger sightings, the agitated villagers of Bommalapura gheraoed them and bundled them inside the cage meant for the tiger.

title: Construction of International Institute for People with Disabilities to start in Kasaragod on September 10
content: The institution, spread across 20 acres and modelled on DAC Thiruvananthapuram, will have training centres for arts and sports, advanced therapy systems, personalised assistive device units, vocational training centres, etc.

title: In Focus podcast | Why most students in Bengal and Odisha take private tuitions
content: Sabir Ahamed speaks to us about the factors contributing to the dependence on private tuition in the east, and¬†how it is reshaping the education system in India.

title: A.P. government ready to bear any cost for poor students: Minister
content: The State government is helping the families of students who died due to any illness through the Swanthana scheme, says Social Welfare Minister Dola Sree Bala Veeranjaneya Swamy

title: All establishments in Karnataka dealing with foreigners told to register with FRRO
content: The State government has directed Karnataka State Police to carry out a close surveillance of areas where a large number of foreign nationals reside. KSP has also been directed to use intelligence officials and those from the Reserve Police Forces for surveillance of these areas.

title: Ramdev‚Äôs remarks on allopathy: Closure report filed in Chhattisgarh FIR, Supreme Court told
content: The complaints filed by the Indian Medical Association alleged that Mr. Ramdev‚Äôs remarks on allopathy undermined COVID-19 control efforts and discouraged people from seeking proper treatment

title: Mudhol hounds Chandra and Kala safeguard sandalwood trees in Shikaripura forests
content: The dogs sense any suspicious activity, smell the presence of a foreign element and run very fast, says the forest staff at Chandrakala State Forest, known for cultivation of sandalwood.

title: 2008 Malegaon blast: Victims move HC against acquittal of Pragya Thakur, 6 others
content: Bombay High Court appeal seeks to overturn Malegaon bomb blast acquittal, citing lack of evidence against accused

title: NIA conducts multi-state raids to probe ISIS-linked terror conspiracy case
content: The searches were conducted in the States of Bihar, Uttar Pradesh, Maharashtra, Karnataka and Tamil Nadu, as well as Jammu and Kashmir on Monday

title: ED questions BJP worker who filed petition in HC questioning Rahul Gandhi's citizenship
content: S. Vignesh Shishir said before entering the ED office that he has been summoned under section 37 of the Foreign Exchange Management Act (FEMA) with regard to the said investigation.

title: Shivamogga: Video of pro-Pakistan slogans goes viral, Bhadravathi police book case
content: The residents of Bhadravathi took out an Id-Milad procession in the town on September 8, and it is said that the video clip was shot during the procession.

title: Prohibitory orders extended in Maddur, security beefed up amid call for bandh
content: About 800 police personnel led by four officials of the rank of Superintendent of Police, three officials of the rank of Additional Superintendent of Police, besides fifteen Deputy Superintendents and thirty Inspectors of Police are manning the town.

title: Over 500 people in Kerala‚Äôs Wayanad fall victim to ‚Äòmule account‚Äô scam
content: Fraudsters from outside the district rent local residents' bank accounts for money and misuse these for illicit transactions and other illegal activities, say investigators

title: Power Rankings: How did each Top 25 team look in Week 2?
content: the limited sample size highlighted some possible concerns for contenders . LSU , Penn State and Georgia had a hard time pulling away from inferior competition in Week 2 . a last-minute defensive breakdown doomed the defending Big 12 champs against Mississippi State .

title: What happened to Oklahoma State? Is USF the team to watch?
content: the ACC and Big Ten show they have multiple teams in contention for the college football playoff . south Florida beat yet another AP Top 25 team and Oklahoma State suffered its biggest loss in over 100 years . our college football experts break down key takeaways from Week 2 performances .

title: How Missouri's pair of five-star recruits fit, plus more 2026 commitment breakdowns
content: a total of 18 five-stars are atop the ESPN 100 player rankings for the men's college basketball class of 2026 . three are off the board as of early September . most recently, no. 12 JaShawn Andrews was the first of this group, announcing his commitment to Arkansas .

title: From top prospect to fringe player, Kobbie Mainoo in limbo at Manchester United
content: Kobbie Mainoo isn't one for big outbursts of emotion, so much so that when he waved his arms to pump up the crowd, he got a bit of light teasing from his teammates in the dressing room afterwards . his decision to ask for a loan move in the final days of the transfer window was not taken lightly .

title: Waiver wire: The key players to add before Week 2
content: the NFL is a weekly league, and player valuation and roles rarely remain stagnant, for positive and negative . the season has kicked off but there's still time to start fresh with a 0-0 record . RB Bijan Robinson saw a memorandum in the game .

title: Fantasy reaction: Bigsby trade a boon to Etienne's fantasy value
content: the fantasy football buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around the NFL . a big spike in Jacory Croskey-Merritt's start rate after his nice performance in Week 1 . Travis Etienne Jr. is the biggest winner here after leading the team .

title: McCarthy, Vikings spoil Ben Johnson's Bears debut
content: the team's new era at quarterback began with a rousing comeback win over the Chicago Bears . the Vikings' defense kept the team in the game while the offense struggled . a 14-yard scramble in the fourth quarter put the team up by 10 and accounted for the final margin .

title: 'That kid is so tough': Caden Durham wants to drive LSU to the finish
content: the 205-pound linebacker is the top high school running back in his class in Texas . he wears his normal size 11 cleats, no steel plate lining the bottom, no more padded insoles . "the prototype," running backs coach Frank Wilson says of what we are looking for .

title: Week 2 Power Rankings: Stacking the teams, plus top non-QB newcomer performances
content: the Minnesota Vikings beat the Chicago Bears on "Monday Night Football" the Packers finished their opening week of the 2025 season with a comeback win . the Pittsburgh Steelers, the Green Bay Packers and the Buffalo Bills topped their power rankings .

title: What makes a baseball player exciting? We asked two rising MLB stars
content: jesse Rogers and Dave Schoenfield weigh in on who's the most exciting player in the MLB this season . the bracket skews young, with the average age (26.4) more than two years younger than the MLB average (28.6)
